input: i am afairlynew lyftriderand iheardheard that  t ub er is stiff competition to lyft and i find that to be true you ber seems to be much better in timing but the lyft drivers are excellent and very patient the last couple of days in a row because of problems at work i have been more than five minutes late to the meeting point from work to catch my lyft ride and i was able to contact them through the app and the drivers patiently waited and did not charge me extra for the pick up so i tried to pay them back by giving a better personal tip and they were very kind especially because of some mild disability here however one problem was that i had to catch another ride to work this morning through lyft and the driver never showed up i was already running 10 minutes late and then the lyft app finally popped up and even though the driver was already supposed to be there 15 minutes earlier it finally popped up telling me that another driver was still 25 minutes away and i would have totally missed my transportation to work so i canceled the lyft ride and called a local taxi and fortunately it only cost me a couple of dollars more plus tip for the local taxi but all in all lyft still has the best price is per ride and very patient drivers who are excellent and helpful with clean cars i am going to learn though not to schedule my morning trips to work with lyft because another strange thing they do is switch drivers on you in the middle of a trip while you're waiting on your first assigned driver it gives you one name and then somewhere later while you're waiting on that driver it changes names and gives you another car so drivers can cut you loose while you're waiting on them and choose somebody else not cool and this is happened to me in the morning so i may just stay away from lyft when i need a ride right before 8 am but otherwise i could not trade the grease on a brand new job for how good these afternoon lyft drivers have been to wait on me with great cars and great service and being flexible on what sort of tip that i give them so i try to tip them well as best i can great service and the best prices but the switching drivers is kind of weird and then totally canceling out on me when i'm waiting on them in the morning to get to work can become a crisis real quick because i am being paid a lot of money to go to work and cannot drive myself all i know i love lyft but they've got to get it together in the app for communications and messaging and not switching your driver while you're waiting on them thanks and hope you guys have safe travels out there i like this company
prompt:
Generate minimum of five labels (two to three words) with very concise descriptions that best summarize the following ride-hailing app review.
Desired format: {label}: {description}
Review: """
i am afairlynew lyftriderand iheardheard that  t ub er is stiff competition to lyft and i find that to be true you ber seems to be much better in timing but the lyft drivers are excellent and very patient the last couple of days in a row because of problems at work i have been more than five minutes late to the meeting point from work to catch my lyft ride and i was able to contact them through the app and the drivers patiently waited and did not charge me extra for the pick up so i tried to pay them back by giving a better personal tip and they were very kind especially because of some mild disability here however one problem was that i had to catch another ride to work this morning through lyft and the driver never showed up i was already running 10 minutes late and then the lyft app finally popped up and even though the driver was already supposed to be there 15 minutes earlier it finally popped up telling me that another driver was still 25 minutes away and i would have totally missed my transportation to work so i canceled the lyft ride and called a local taxi and fortunately it only cost me a couple of dollars more plus tip for the local taxi but all in all lyft still has the best price is per ride and very patient drivers who are excellent and helpful with clean cars i am going to learn though not to schedule my morning trips to work with lyft because another strange thing they do is switch drivers on you in the middle of a trip while you're waiting on your first assigned driver it gives you one name and then somewhere later while you're waiting on that driver it changes names and gives you another car so drivers can cut you loose while you're waiting on them and choose somebody else not cool and this is happened to me in the morning so i may just stay away from lyft when i need a ride right before 8 am but otherwise i could not trade the grease on a brand new job for how good these afternoon lyft drivers have been to wait on me with great cars and great service and being flexible on what sort of tip that i give them so i try to tip them well as best i can great service and the best prices but the switching drivers is kind of weird and then totally canceling out on me when i'm waiting on them in the morning to get to work can become a crisis real quick because i am being paid a lot of money to go to work and cannot drive myself all i know i love lyft but they've got to get it together in the app for communications and messaging and not switching your driver while you're waiting on them thanks and hope you guys have safe travels out there i like this company
""""
labels: ['1. Patient Drivers: Lyft drivers are excellent and very patient, even when the rider is running late.', '2. Best Prices: Lyft still has the best prices per ride compared to competitors.', '3. Unreliable Morning Rides: Lyft can be unreliable for morning rides due to driver switching and cancellations.', '4. Clean Cars: Lyft drivers have clean cars and provide great service.', '5. Communication Issues: Lyft needs to improve their app for better communication and messaging with riders.']

input: usually cheaper than uber not cheaper than a cab but more reliable usually a dollar more than my local cab company or 2 with a tip worth a dollar or 2 more if you don't want the aggravation of waiting i use the wait and save  15 minutes before i have to leave some times most of the time it's never more than 5 to 10 minutes when i call a cab they say 5 to 10 minutes i've waited up to an hour sometimes 30hr never less than 15 and then they say do you mind if i stop i've got another pick up really i think lyft could and should work on their pricing late at night prices double inclement weather or busy triple sometimes i think if your a regular customer which i am they should base their prices on the local taxi fares when i say they are 1 or two more than the local taxi that is the best one in our area there are ones cheaper by 3 or 4 dollars but they re a nightmare and are only available certain hours when lyft doubles or triples it's price i do use a cab i've called for a lyft and a 8,9,10.$ride is now 23 $or more than i just can't and won't pay that a little extra is fine but overcharging excessively because someone is stuck is horrendous as far as i'm concerned there's a name for that it's called price gouging most people know and appreciate the service and will tip the driver extra however when that happens you don't appreciate the service and i don't want not to tip the driver so i do and am resentful and mad i even paid for the service all and all it's a great company a great convenience as with all companies could it be better absolutely in general there going in the right direction for me if they charged me 8$everyday every time instead of 9 or 10$ for the same service i would use them a minimum of 2 times a day 5days a week but because of their price changes i probably only use them 6times a week i shop around and only use them when i  truly can't be late or can't be bothered do use them enough to say all in all they re great i wish i i had no disparaging remarks to say about them i think they are on their way to greatness with those couple fixes i would recommend them to everyone and anyone i know i have and do but tell them to be wary and check out their options first sometimes ubers cheaper if they don't mind waiting call a cab if its late or bad weather or heavy traffic ask a friend unfortunately that's my stance i want and wish i could stand 100%behind them and hopefully one day i will be able too that said i still give them 5 stars

input: well it's been a roller coaster riding with lyft because i just started using lyft a week ago and the first day i used it was the worst experience you could have i guess i shouldn't have let ivonne the driver invite someone else to drive me to atlantic city because he was a very unsafe driver and he speeded and drove recklessly at times and then as we arrived in atlantic city the mood changed very quickly because ivonne wanted a off the books ride so we came to an agreement on $100 cash and then the driver who she said was her boss so i guess because he was the one that actually drove he wanted the $170 that was the price that was close to what the ride would've been which didn't make sense to me because it's not like lyft doesn't take there share of the ride so we got into an argument and i didn't know where we were so as we drove down harrahs blvd he decided to stop the car and jump into the back where he decided to start hitting me in my leg and thigh and then started punching me and i was trying to calm him down and i said whatever i will just give you the money and then he said then give it to me then he grabbed my cell phone and threw it into the bushes area and i was going to get the phone but then i saw him jump into the car so i didn't want him to take off with all my belongings so i was able to pop the trunk and grab my duffel bag but i wasn't able to grab my suitcase which had most of my clothes thousands of dollars worth of clothes i had cash and jewelry and other personal belongings that i really need but he just took off and wouldn't even answer the phone and ivonne acted like none of this ever happened so i was assaulted and then grand theft of my suitcase so it started off as a nightmare but since then the drivers have been great and they are just what i expected them to be!!!

""""

input:
also will it would be nice if there was an option to change the time, to offer more money for a better pick up and or drop off, to have an inner-city version for within cities, it would be nice to show rides in progress with available seats so you could try to get in on a ride that is happening now, also if you could share your destination with someone else, writing a review should be like airbnb with buttons for example friendly, on time, smoking etc., it would be nice if you could upload your playlist to blah blah car so drivers could use it, also it would be nice to know if cars had a usb for a charging phone, also you could encourage drivers to have those airplane pillows, maybe even blanketsand they could let passengers know if they have them, also it would be nice to know the license plate of the car without having to ask in a text message, having pictures would be good especially if drivers use the same pick up and drop off spots, a negotiate option would be nice to try and get a better price, especially at the last minute or even a discount if you book 2 or three seats, also passengers should be able to post where you want to go and how much you are offering so that possible drivers can accept, not only passengers accepting, blablacar suggestions: since they have a lot of data about popular rides and times and prices, they should suggest rides and prices for a drivers to accept, there should be a way to tip, maybe just 1-2 euros
deliveries : blah blah car could offer drivers to do deliveries to make extra money

input: i hate via they take way to long they take your money i paid for a via pass which is $15 i paid for it on july 8 so used it july 10 i owed a $1 which i paid the next day that day i rode via twice when i came out of walmart they had logged me out my via account and when i tried to log back in it kept saying something with the billing issue so i called via they kept telling me they didn't know what was going on they was going to contact they support managers to see what's going on they will give me a call we'll that never happened i emailed them 6 times i have called 5 they said they same thing by time friday came i had to pay for a new pass i said when you do activate my account again will i have to pay for another via pass i didn't get to use the one i had they said they wouldn't be able to give me credit or refund my money well here it it now week 2 tuesday they said the reason i couldn't used my pass because i owed a dollar july 10 lol really i said i have the receipt it was paid for they still went on about it took it off my card but didn't give it to via at this point i'm so frustrated because i've been going at this for a min to the point the man that's been telling me he can't help me all week long say oh i'm going to activate your account and credit you $2 why the would you credit me $2 when i paid $15 and wasn't able to use my account i recorded everything i hate that this is literally the only transportation around because i live so far out in west sac they need to stop robbing people and give better customer service

input: i ordered a lift to  night an d they told me it would be 35 myopic 37m so i wanted them i got a text telling me that the driver canceled so i said what the heck then they text me and said they were sending me a different car i said what do you mean i have been waiting for 40m         the guy said you can cancel i said you got to be  kidding me y took my money and now you want me to pay more money i said your out of your mine i wantreimbursement for the first ride you're charging me for the first ride and now you want to charge me for the second one i think this is deplorable people have no money as it is i had $20 to my name when i first called it said 645 and then when i confirmed it and waited for the ride it went up to 849 i want this fixed i want my money back or i want a free ride and i will spread this news and social media believe me i don't think anybody would appreciate this all i was trying to do is go to the store and get what i need toilet paper paper towels lemons some bananas avocado cilantro i had $20 thank god on my debit card i had $20 now i have nothing thank you very much and this is it a person that works day today i'm 59 years old and i am disabled i have multiple things wrong with me i try to do everything i can on my own the last thing i would have done was called lyft but the cab company was busy by the time you came and got me i could've been to the market and back sad situation bad business bad business bad conversation with your patriots that's not how you make money and i am going to post wax

input: i was hesitant to book an uber bc of all the horror stories i heard about ubers stealing credit card info, drivers kidnapping, robbing, and even raping customers but my husband and i needed an uber bc we were going out in nashville the drop off went well nice driver clean car decent price but when it was time to pick us back up the app gave us a different driver we were out waiting on our ride freezing my phone ended up dying the driver never showed we walked a few blocks and found a way to charge my phone as soon as it came on it said the uber cancel the ride and still charged me i blamed it on my phone dying and just booked another ride it charged $50 more than the last uber but i was desperate freezing and i just wanted a ride so i booked it we still waited almost an hour finally the driver came he was great but i had to ask why is this ride so much more he said when it's a high demand for drivers the prices goes up ridiculous i tried calling uber to say we were at the pickup location and the driver canceled the ride we couldn't get anyone on the phone for customer service and the app is automated responses can't say i want use an uber again bc i travel a lot but i do hope you guys do better with a rider being able to call from a different phone if their phone dies also the price changes aren't fair
prompt:
Generate minimum of five labels (two to three words) with very concise descriptions that best summarize the following ride-hailing app review.
Desired format: {label}: {description}
Review: """
i was hesitant to book an uber bc of all the horror stories i heard about ubers stealing credit card info, drivers kidnapping, robbing, and even raping customers but my husband and i needed an uber bc we were going out in nashville the drop off went well nice driver clean car decent price but when it was time to pick us back up the app gave us a different driver we were out waiting on our ride freezing my phone ended up dying the driver never showed we walked a few blocks and found a way to charge my phone as soon as it came on it said the uber cancel the ride and still charged me i blamed it on my phone dying and just booked another ride it charged $50 more than the last uber but i was desperate freezing and i just wanted a ride so i booked it we still waited almost an hour finally the driver came he was great but i had to ask why is this ride so much more he said when it's a high demand for drivers the prices goes up ridiculous i tried calling uber to say we were at the pickup location and the driver canceled the ride we couldn't get anyone on the phone for customer service and the app is automated responses can't say i want use an uber again bc i travel a lot but i do hope you guys do better with a rider being able to call from a different phone if their phone dies also the price changes aren't fair
""""
labels: ['1. Inconsistent Service: App gave different driver, ride cancelled, charged extra', '2. High Demand Pricing: Prices go up during high demand for drivers', '3. No Customer Service: Unable to reach customer service through phone or app', '4. Safety Concerns: Hesitant to book due to safety concerns with Uber', '5. Good Driver, Clean Car: Positive experience with driver and car cleanliness']

input: i paid for a ride and they let the uber driver get to my location cancel my ride and take someone else right in front of my eyes and i didn't receive a refund and for no reason lyft rides were extremely expensive that day coughing average about twice as much as they usually are i go to work every weekend and it only cost me normally $25 but today it happened to be $50 and some change and i kept looking for rides and no one was available to pick me up furthermore i was highly upset once i spoke to the driver and he told me someone else's name and the person also told me i was trying to steal their ride when i was in it was originally my ride but he canceled it i tried to play it off like he never had me as his original rider bottom line is uber is also cheaper and is more convenient rainbow also refund your money when you don't have any rider i am a normal person that this had unfortunately happened to and not some random advertiser and yes this situation i am in may be a rare occasion but i do acknowledge that it is still not ok for what happened to be excused in any way shape or form to anyone who is ready be advised

""""

Cheaper and Convenient: Uber is cheaper and more convenient than this ride-hailing app']

input:
their app is not secure
when they impose to leave the app page open

two credit cards as payment method after four rides 
less than 24 hour lyft sent me a notification the credit card set as default declined accepting the fee
lyft automatically breach second credit card which was my personal bank account charged 32.99 stating withdrawal for a lyft rude in san francisco which is where their hq
no way to have any decent lyft customer service reach out 
they instead act like a zelle emailed me more than 3 times to update my payment where i already deleted my credit card information because of their mess
now am without access to my bank account as i had to cancel the credit cards i had on file with lyft because of the unauthorized charges
they have yet contacted me in that regard
lyft snap their fingers and i should say how high

i never trust them 

i just had to use them this week due to an emergency i had to run to the er and other trips affecting me

end of review 
never trust this company 
they enjoy being a mess
